Name: Branch & Blade Song
Desc4: When Anomaly Mastery exceeds or equals 115 points, the equipper's CRIT DMG increases by 30%. When any squad member applies <color=#98EFF0>Freeze</color> or triggers the <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color> effect on an enemy, the equipper's CRIT Rate increases by 12%, lasting 15s.
Story: Inspired by the legendary "Tale of Blade & Branch," this song depicts a young man with amazing swordsmanship as he travels the world, doing good deeds and fighting evil. Some say it's a biography of a prodigious swordsman of the Hoshimi family.
